description:
**Fix Overview**:

To implement the latest features and improvements in Windows 11 23H3, apply the KB5040442 cumulative update:

1. Download the KB5040442 cumulative update from the Microsoft support site.
2. Run the installer and follow the prompts to complete the installation.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes and activate the new features, including the restored 'Show Desktop' button.

**Details**:
This update includes up to thirty-one enhancements and changes to improve user experience. It adds back functionality that was modified or removed in previous updates. Make sure to assess your current system configurations and compatibility before applying the update to prevent any disruptions. Backup your system data prior to installation to ensure data integrity.
